plot: Han Fuqu defects to Chiang Kaishek in 1929 but they are in frequent conflict and an agent with the codename of Black Plum Blossom keeps watch on Han.
title: Minguo te da mou sha an
plot_es: Han Fuqu defects to Chiang Kaishek in 1929 but they are in frequent conflict and an agent with the codename of Black Plum Blossom keeps watch on Han.
original_name: Minguo te da mou sha an
